snippet: Incoming leaders of Norway’s new government said they would end a 32-year ban on professional boxing in the country after taking office next week.
abstract: Incoming leaders of Norway’s new government say they will end a 32-year ban on professional boxing in the country.
lead_paragraph: Incoming leaders of Norway’s new government said they would end a 32-year ban on professional boxing in the country after taking office next week.

headline.main: Norway to Scrap Ban on Boxing
